tool_description: Get information on countries around the world. ISO2, ISO3, capitals, currencies, surface area, and more!
title: Countries

api_list.name: list all countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries59.p.rapidapi.com/list_countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries59.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: iso3
api_list.description: This gets country name on a country. Use ISO3 for country_code.

api_list.name: iso2
api_list.description: This gets country name on a country. Use ISO2 for country_code.

api_list.name: get time zone
api_list.description: This gets timezone data on a country. Use ISO2 for country_code.

api_list.name: get phone number
api_list.description: This gets phone codes on a country. Use ISO2 for country_code.

api_list.name: get language
api_list.description: This gets language data on a country. Use ISO2 for country_code.

body.data: {'Country Name': 'United States', 'Languages': 'English 82.1%, Spanish 10.7%, other Indo-European 3.8%, Asian and Pacific island 2.7%, other 0.7% (2000 census)', 'Language Codes': 'en-US,es-US,haw,fr'}

api_list.name: get all
